channel.title: deep learning on Anmol Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in deep learning on Anmol Sharma

item.title: Missing MRI Pulse Sequence Synthesis using Multi-Modal Generative Adversarial Network
ERGO: Efficient Recurrent Graph Optimized Emitter Density Estimation in Single Molecule Localization Microscopy
[Invited Talk] MM-GAN: Multi-Modal Generative Adversarial Network for Missing MRI Pulse Sequence Synthesis
item.description: Invited to present my research in which we proposed a multi-input, multi-output generative adversarial network (GAN) called MM-GAN as a poster presentation.

item.title: [Invited Talk] Missing MRI Pulse Sequence Synthesis using Multi-Modal Generative Adversarial Network
item.description: Invited to present my research in which we proposed a multi-input, multi-output generative adversarial network (GAN) called MM-GAN.

item.title: [Paper Presentation] Deep Anomaly Detection with Outlier Exposure
item.description: Presented an interesting paper from ICLR 2019 that performs out-of-distribution sample detection using a simple framework.

item.title: [Paper Presentation] Natural Language Processing in Text Mining for Structural Modeling of Protien Complexes
item.description: Presenting a highly scientific paper in a way that high school students can understand. The paper is a state-of-art method that uses natural language processing based approach towards structural modelling of proteins.

item.title: Knowledge Extraction and Text Mining in Bioinformatics
item.description: Literature survey on the uses of text mining and natural language processing methods in bioinformatics.

item.title: Dealing with Missing Modalities in Medical Images What's Missing?
item.description: A talk regarding the current state-of-art in handling missing inputs for segmentation or classification problems.

item.title: A CADe System for Gliomas in Brain MRI using Convolutional Neural Networks
Select, Attend, and Transfer: Light, Learnable Skip Connections
Comparison of Deep Reinforcement Learning Algorithms for Learning Control Policies for Physics-based Locomotion Tasks
item.description: Comparison of various state-of-art reinforcement learning algorithms

item.title: A Mathematical Tutorial on Reinforcement Learning
item.description: A mathematical, in-depth tutorial about reinforcement learning presented to the lab members. This was to facilitate members to take up RL methods and apply them to their respective problem areas, as well as for myself to understand RL in an in-depth way.

item.title: [Paper Presentation] Multi-Scale Deep Reinforcement Learning for Real-Time 3D-Landmark Detection in CT Scans
item.description: This talk covers the first known application of reinforcement learning agents for landmark detection in CT Scans in medical imaging.

item.title: Evaluating Machine Translation Systems using Weighted Vote of Different Scoring Metrics
item.description: We propose a novel multi-metric voting scheme for evaluating machine translation systems.

item.title: Modelling Chinese Word Segmentation as Sequence to Sequence Prediction Problem
item.description: Re-imagining the problem of word segmentation as a sequence prediction problem, predicting spaces between words in a sequence.

item.title: Predicting Survival Time for Patients Diagnosed with Gliomas Using Compressed Representation of Brain MRI Scans
item.description: Convolutional neural networks based autoencoders for generating low-dimensional representations of brain MRI scans.
